General.Name: DA Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: DA Technology Co.,Ltd. provides manufacturing solutions for automated assembly of rechargeable batteries in South Korea and internationally. It also offers secondary battery and other equipment. The company was formerly known as Daesung FA System Co., Ltd. and changed its name to DA Technology Co.,Ltd. in July 2003. DA Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Hwaseong-si,, South Korea.
